description: Thrust a blade at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health.
Thrust a blade at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health. Heals you if the enemy dies within 2 seconds.
Thrust a blade at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health. Increased range.
Flash through the shadows to appear at an enemy's location and strike them, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 1 second.
Flash through the shadows and deal Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies. Afflicts enemies with Minor Vulnerability, increasing damage taken by 5% for 10 seconds.
Flash through the shadows to appear at an enemy's location and strike them, dealing Magic Damage. Grants Empower, increasing damage of your next Heavy Attack by 80%.
Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura, granting Major Evasion for 26 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 20%.
Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura, granting Major Evasion and Minor Resolve for 26 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 20% and increasing Physical and Spell Resistance.
Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura, granting Major Evasion and Major Expedition for 26 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30%.
Mark an enemy, exposing them to attacks for 30 seconds. Marked enemy takes 10% increased damage from you. You heal when the marked enemy dies.
Mark an enemy, exposing them to attacks for 30 seconds. Marked enemy takes 10% increased damage from you. Prevents the enemy from going invisible and heals you when they die.
Mark an enemy, exposing them to attacks for 30 seconds. Marked enemy takes 10% increased damage from you. Grants Major Berserk when the marked enemy dies, increasing damage done by 10%.
Gain Minor Berserk for 20 seconds, increasing damage done by 5%. While active, hitting with 5 Light or Heavy Attacks converts this ability to Spectral Bow.
Gain Minor Berserk for 20 seconds. While active, hitting with 5 Light or Heavy Attacks converts this to Assassin's Will, dealing increased damage and restoring Magicka.
Gain Minor Berserk and Minor Endurance for 20 seconds. While active, hitting with 5 Light or Heavy Attacks converts this to Assassin's Scourge, which heals you on hit.
Ravage an enemy with a swift strike, dealing Magic Damage and afflicting them with Trauma for 6 seconds, reducing their healing received by 30%.
Ravage an enemy with a swift strike, dealing Magic Damage and applying Trauma for 6 seconds. Stuns the target for 3 seconds if they are below 25% Health. Reduced cost.
Ravage an enemy with a swift strike, dealing Magic Damage and applying Trauma for 6 seconds. Grants 10 Ultimate when you kill an enemy while slotted.
Increases Weapon and Spell Damage while invisible or in stealth. Increases duration of stuns against enemies by 20%.
Restores Magicka and Stamina when you kill an enemy with an Assassination ability.
Increases Critical Strike Chance for each Assassination ability slotted.
Increases Critical Damage done for each Assassination ability slotted.
Cloak yourself in shadow, becoming invisible for 3 seconds. Breaks on taking damage or using an ability.
Cloak yourself in shadow, becoming invisible for 3 seconds. Your next direct damage attack made from stealth is a guaranteed Critical Strike.
Cloak yourself in shadow for 3 seconds. While cloaked, heal yourself and remove up to 3 negative effects.
Thrust a blade through the shadows at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and setting them Off Balance. Stuns for 4 seconds if used from stealth or invisibility.
Thrust a blade through the shadows at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and setting them Off Balance. Increases movement speed while invisible. Deals increased damage from stealth.
Thrust a blade through the shadows at an enemy, dealing Physical Damage and setting them Off Balance. Applies Major Breach, reducing armor. Stuns from stealth.
Create a corridor of shadows for 10 seconds. You and allies walking on the path gain Major Expedition, increasing movement speed by 30%.
Create a corridor of shadows for 10 seconds. You and allies walking on the path gain Major Expedition. The path also deals Magic Damage over time to enemies.
Create a corridor of shadows for 10 seconds. You and allies walking on the path gain Major Expedition and are healed over time while on the path.
Unleash a dark specter to terrify up to 2 nearby enemies, causing them to cower in fear for 4 seconds.
Unleash a dark specter to terrify up to 6 nearby enemies, causing them to cower in fear for 4 seconds. Reduced cost.
Place 2 traps at your location. Enemies who trigger a trap are feared for 4 seconds. Traps last 1 minute.
Summon a shade at target location for 20 seconds. The shade attacks nearby enemies and applies Minor Maim, reducing their damage done by 5%.
Summon a shade at target location for 20 seconds. The shade attacks nearby enemies, dealing increased damage and applying Minor Maim.
Summon a shade at target location for 20 seconds. The shade applies Minor Maim. Activating again teleports you to the shade's location.
Create an area of darkness for 12 seconds that applies Major Protection to you and allies, reducing damage taken by 10%. You are invisible while in the area.
Create an area of darkness for 12 seconds that applies Major Protection to you and allies. You are invisible while in the area. Allies also receive Minor Protection.
Create an area of darkness for 12 seconds that applies Major Protection and deals Magic Damage to enemies inside every second. You are invisible while in the area.
Increases Stamina Recovery for each Shadow ability slotted.
Gain Major Resolve when exiting stealth or invisibility, increasing Physical and Spell Resistance.
Increases Max Health for each Shadow ability slotted.
Increases duration of Shadow abilities by 2 seconds.
Steal an enemy's life force, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds and healing you every 2 seconds.
Steal an enemy's life force, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds. Heals you and a nearby ally every 2 seconds.
Steal an enemy's life force, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds. Heals you every 2 seconds. Initial hit deals additional damage.
Cause an enemy to writhe in agony, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and dealing Magic Damage over 20 seconds.
Cause an enemy to writhe in agony, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and dealing Magic Damage over 20 seconds. Spreads to nearby enemies when target dies.
Cause an enemy to writhe in agony, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and dealing Magic Damage over 20 seconds. Applies Major Cowardice, reducing Weapon and Spell Damage.
Sap an enemy's agility, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds and applying Major Expedition to you while slowing the enemy by 30%.
Sap an enemy's agility, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds and applying Major Expedition to you while slowing the enemy by 30%. Restores Magicka each tick.
Sap an enemy's agility, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds, applying Major Expedition to you, and rooting the enemy in place for 1.5 seconds.
Embrace the powers of darkness, gaining a portion of your Max Health, Magicka, and Stamina back each time you deal damage with a Light or Heavy Attack for 20 seconds.
Embrace the powers of darkness for 20 seconds, restoring Magicka and Stamina with each Light or Heavy Attack. Restore additional resources when the effect ends.
Embrace the powers of darkness for 20 seconds, restoring Health and Stamina with each Light or Heavy Attack. Restore additional resources when the effect ends.
Steal the life force from nearby enemies, dealing Magic Damage. Gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for each enemy hit, increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 20 seconds.
Steal the life force from nearby enemies, dealing Physical Damage. Gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for each enemy hit. Enemies are afflicted with Minor Cowardice.
Steal the life force from nearby enemies, dealing Magic Damage and healing you for each enemy hit. Gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for each enemy hit.
Rend the souls of nearby enemies, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 4 seconds. Allies can activate Soul Leech synergy to deal damage and heal.
Rend the souls of nearby enemies, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 4 seconds. Heals you and nearby allies. Allies can activate Soul Leech synergy.
Rend the souls of nearby enemies, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 4 seconds. Tethered enemies take additional damage over time and you heal for each enemy tethered.
Increases effectiveness of potions by 10%. Grants Ultimate when drinking a potion.
Increases Max Magicka for each Siphoning ability slotted.
Increases healing done for each Siphoning ability slotted.
Generates 2 Ultimate when dealing damage with a Siphoning ability.
Command a cliff racer to dive bomb an enemy, dealing Magic Damage.
Command a cliff racer to dive bomb an enemy, dealing Physical Damage. Applies a bleed, dealing Physical Damage over 6 seconds.
Command a cliff racer to dive bomb an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Deals up to 50% more damage based on distance to target.
Stir a group of shalk that burst from the ground after 3 seconds, dealing Magic Damage to enemies in front of you.
Stir a group of shalk that burst from the ground after 3 seconds, dealing Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. Applies Major Breach, reducing armor for 10 seconds.
Stir a group of shalk that burst from the ground after 3 seconds, dealing Magic Damage to enemies in front of you. Applies Major Breach, reducing armor for 10 seconds.
Call a swarm of fetcherflies to attack an enemy, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds. Applies Minor Vulnerability, increasing their damage taken by 5%.
Call a swarm of fetcherflies to attack an enemy, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds. Applies Minor Vulnerability. Transfers to a nearby enemy when target dies.
Call a swarm of fetcherflies to attack an enemy, dealing Magic Damage over 10 seconds. Applies Minor Vulnerability. Final tick deals increased damage.
Call a betty netch to your side for 25 seconds. The netch restores Magicka over time and grants Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%.
Call a betty netch to your side for 25 seconds. The netch restores Magicka over time and grants Major Brutality and Sorcery. Removes 1 negative effect when summoned.
Call a bull netch to your side for 25 seconds. The netch restores Stamina over time and grants Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%.
Invoke the spirit of a falcon, granting Major Expedition and Minor Endurance for 10 seconds, increasing movement speed by 30% and Stamina Recovery by 15%.
Invoke the spirit of a falcon, granting Major Expedition, Minor Endurance, and Minor Evasion for 10 seconds, increasing movement speed and Stamina Recovery while reducing area damage taken.
Invoke the spirit of a falcon, granting Major Expedition, Minor Endurance, and Minor Berserk for 10 seconds, increasing movement speed, Stamina Recovery, and damage done.
Call a ferocious war bear to fight by your side. The bear bites enemies for Physical Damage and executes enemies below 25% Health. Can reactivate to command the bear to maul an enemy.
Call a ferocious war bear to fight by your side. The bear bites enemies for Physical Damage and executes enemies below 25% Health. The bear respawns automatically when killed.
Call a ferocious war bear to fight by your side. The bear bites enemies for Magic Damage and executes enemies below 25% Health. Bear damage scales with your Max Magicka.
When one of your Animal Companions abilities ends, heal yourself.
Increases your Ultimate generation when you use an Animal Companions ability.
Increases Magicka and Stamina Recovery for each Animal Companions ability slotted.
Increases damage done by Animal Companions abilities.
Grow a fungal bloom that heals you and nearby allies.
Grow a fungal bloom that heals you and nearby allies. Grants Minor Intellect and Minor Endurance, increasing Magicka and Stamina Recovery.
Grow a fungal bloom that heals you and nearby allies. Heals for increased amount on allies below 50% Health.
Plant a healing seed at target location, healing allies in the area over 6 seconds. Allies can activate the Harvest synergy to heal themselves.
Plant a healing seed at target location, healing allies in the area over 6 seconds. Activating again triggers the synergy early, healing allies and granting Minor Vitality.
Plant a healing seed at target location, healing allies over 6 seconds. Also damages enemies in the area and applies Major Defile, reducing their healing received.
Grow vines that embrace you or the lowest Health ally in front of you for 10 seconds. The vines heal the target each time they take damage.
Grow vines that embrace you or the lowest Health ally in front of you for 10 seconds. The vines heal the target each time they take damage and apply Minor Lifesteal to attackers.
Grow vines that embrace you or the lowest Health ally in front of you for 10 seconds. The vines heal the target each time they take damage. Burst heals when the effect ends.
Embrace the lotus blessing for 20 seconds. While active, your Light and Heavy Attacks heal you or a nearby ally.
Embrace the lotus blessing for 20 seconds. While active, your Light and Heavy Attacks heal you or a nearby ally. Grants Major Savagery and Prophecy, increasing critical chance.
Embrace the lotus blessing for 20 seconds. While active, your Light and Heavy Attacks heal you or a nearby ally. Healing is increased and costs Stamina.
Launch a vine at an ally, healing them and pulling you to their location. Grants Minor Expedition, increasing movement speed.
Launch a vine at an ally, healing them and pulling you to their location. Grants Minor Expedition. Heals the target again when you arrive.
Launch a vine at an ally, healing them instantly for a larger amount. Does not pull you to their location. Grants Minor Expedition.
Create a forest of healing at your location. You and allies in the area are healed every 1 second for 6 seconds and cleansed of negative effects.
Create a forest of healing at your location. You and allies in the area are healed every 1 second for 6 seconds. Healing is increased on allies below 50% Health.
Create a forest of healing at your location. You and allies in the area are healed every 1 second for 6 seconds. Forest moves towards your target ally over the duration.
When you heal yourself or an ally with a Green Balance ability while under 50% Health, gain Major Mending, increasing healing done by 16% for 4 seconds.
When you heal yourself or an ally with a Green Balance ability, restore Magicka. This effect can occur once every 3 seconds.
Increases healing received for each Green Balance ability slotted.
When you heal yourself or an ally with a Green Balance ability, grant Minor Toughness for 20 seconds, increasing Max Health.
Wrap a cloak of frost around you and nearby allies, granting Major Resolve for 20 seconds, increasing Physical and Spell Resistance.
Wrap a cloak of frost around you and nearby allies, granting Major Resolve and Minor Protection for 20 seconds, increasing resistances and reducing damage taken.
Wrap a cloak of frost around you and nearby allies, granting Major Resolve for 20 seconds. Increased radius and duration.
Summon icy shards around you, dealing Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by 30%.
Summon icy shards at target location, dealing Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds. Enemies in the area are immobilized for 3 seconds.
Summon icy shards at target location, dealing Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by 30%. Increased damage.
Envelop yourself in a healing frost, instantly healing yourself and gaining Major Resolve for 20 seconds.
Envelop yourself in a healing frost, instantly healing yourself and gaining Major Resolve for 20 seconds. Also heals a nearby ally for the same amount.
Envelop yourself in a healing frost, instantly healing yourself and dealing Frost Damage over 5 seconds to nearby enemies. Stuns enemies at the end of the duration.
Conjure icy orbs around you that absorb projectiles for 6 seconds. Each orb absorbs one projectile. Gain Minor Vitality, increasing healing received.
Conjure icy orbs around you that absorb projectiles for 6 seconds. Each orb absorbs one projectile and returns Frost Damage to the attacker. Gain Minor Vitality.
Conjure icy orbs around you that absorb projectiles for 6 seconds. Each orb absorbed generates Ultimate. Gain Minor Vitality.
Summon an ancient portal at target location. The first enemy to pass through is teleported to you and immobilized. Portal lasts 30 seconds.
Summon an ancient portal at target location. The first enemy to pass through is teleported to you and immobilized. Portal lasts 30 seconds. Enemy takes Frost Damage on teleport.
Summon an ancient portal at target location. Activating again teleports you and nearby allies to the portal location. Portal lasts 30 seconds.
Twist a violent storm around you, dealing Frost Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds to enemies in the area. Reduces their Movement Speed by 70% and grants Major Protection.
Twist a violent storm around you, dealing Frost Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds. Reduces enemy Movement Speed and grants Major Protection. Increases Max Magicka while slotted.
Twist a violent storm around you, dealing Frost Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds. Reduces enemy Movement Speed. Grants Major Protection. Stuns enemies when the effect ends.
Increases chance to apply Chilled to enemies with Winter's Embrace abilities.
Increases Physical and Spell Resistance for each Winter's Embrace ability slotted.
Reduces the cost of Block for each Winter's Embrace ability slotted.
Increases damage done with Winter's Embrace abilities.
